short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The primary purpose of the Maps Assist extension is to provide you with quick directions via a widget on your browser toolbar

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Maps Assist provides quick access to reliable directions and maps via a widget on your browser toolbar.

Plan everyday commutes and road trips with ease. Get online maps and driving, walking, and cycling directions.

How to use the maps tool:
- Add the extension to your Chrome™ browser
- Pin the extension to your browser's toolbar for quick access to the maps widget
- Enter your starting point and destination to find directions
- Zoom in and out to explore the map, and switch between road, satellite, and terrain views
- Print directions for convenient access
- Share routes via Whatsapp, email or by copying the link

We welcome your ideas and suggestions to improve this extension. Please note that you can uninstall the extension if you are dissatisfied with the product.
